CSSSkewY.summary: The CSSSkewY interface of the CSS Typed Object Model API represents the skewY() value of the individual {{CSSXRef('transform')}} property in CSS. It inherits properties and methods from its parent .

CSSSkewYAy.summary:
The ay property of the
interface gets and sets the angle used to distort the element
along the y-axis (or ordinate).

CSSSkewYCSSSkewY.summary:
The CSSSkewY() constructor creates a new
object which represents the
skewY() value
of the individual 'transform' property in CSS.
